{{also|miete|mieté|miętę}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|miete}}, from {{inh|de|goh|miata}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*mēzdō}}, {{m|gem-pro|*mizdō||meed}}, from {{inh|de|ine-pro|*misdʰós}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*mey-|t=to exchange}}. Cognates include {{cog|iir-pro|*miždʰám}}, {{cog|cu|мьзда||reward|tr=mьzda}} and {{cog|en|meed||recompense, payment, reward}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈmiːtə/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Miete.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Miete.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Mieten}} # [[rent]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|halbe Miete}} * {{l|de|mietfrei}} * {{l|de|Mietvertrag}}
